html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-04472022-04-29,  ,  PS,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Firearms Act
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE FIREARMS ACT in order to (1) amend the Conditions of Transferring Firearms and Other Weapons Regulations to require licence verification prior to any transfer of a non-restricted firearm; (2) amend the Firearms Licences Regulations to describe the information which businesses would be required to keep; (3) amend the Aboriginal Peoples of Canada Adaptations Regulations (Firearms) to remove references to Possession-Only Licences; and (4) repeal the Firearms Information Regulations (Non-restricted Firearms).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0091 Publication Date: 2022-05-11
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Firearms Act
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE FIREARMS ACT in order to (1) amend the Conditions of Transferring Firearms and Other Weapons Regulations to require licence verification prior to any transfer of a non-restricted firearm; (2) amend the Firearms Licences Regulations to describe the information which businesses would be required to keep; (3) amend the Aboriginal Peoples of Canada Adaptations Regulations (Firearms) to remove references to Possession-Only Licences; and (4) repeal the Firearms Information Regulations (Non-restricted Firearms).
